name: Bad Toaster Dream Trijam
description:
What if your toaster become too smart to just cook you some crunchy toasts for breakfast every morning?
Imagine  what he can do to avenge you for that daily humiliation? 
You are playiong as some random VR enthusiast which felt asleep during another 8h in a row playsession and woke up in weird world of smart toaster dream.
Will this dream be nightmare for you or your toaster - is up to your actions.

This game was solely developed to learn and try some ways to implement dialogue system in Godot without plugins.

It took me 1h to draw pixel art (no prior expirience, so be gentle with me, senpai xD)
And up to 2h to write all dialogs and game logick. I can't provide precise time since I had no oportunity to work for 3h in a row. So I'll leave it for your judgement.

Controls: just point and click on anything you think might be interactable and follow instructions.

Have a nice day!
